The post MetaWin Review: Anonymous Provably Fair Crypto Casino & Sportsbook, Is it Legit? appeared first on Blockonomi.
item.content:encoded:
MetaWin is an exciting new online casino that offers a truly innovative and anonymous gambling experience on the Ethereum blockchain.

As a fully decentralized platform, MetaWin allows you to gamble without ever creating an account or providing any personal information.

This cutting-edge approach delivers complete privacy while giving you access to a great selection of games, generous competitions, and opportunities to win valuable NFTs.

Here’s our full review …

Visit MetaWin

Quick Verdict: MetaWin is a crypto casino that delivers anonymous & provably fair gambling by allowing users to connect a Ethereum wallet to access slots, table games, live dealers & more.

Quick Facts

Category Information
Platform Decentralized casino operating on the Ethereum blockchain
Player Experience Completely anonymous, no account creation or personal details required
Payments Deposits and withdrawals via cryptocurrency wallets like MetaMask (Only Ethereum accepted)
Game Variety Slots, table games, live dealer games, blockchain competitions, NFT prizes
Game Providers Games from regulated providers like Pragmatic Play to ensure fairness
Unique Features Smart contract-based competitions with transparent randomized winners on the blockchain. Opportunities to win valuable NFTs.
Advantages Anonymity, instant payouts, no minimum deposits, innovative blockchain integration

Casino Games

Roulette

MetaWin offers authentic European roulette experiences with a house edge of just 2.7%. Place your bets on numbers, colors, odds/evens and more as the ball spins around the wheel. The classy European format has just a single zero to contend with.

Blackjack

Test your blackjack skills at MetaWin’s tables powered by Pragmatic Play. Several variants are available including Classic Blackjack, Double Exposure, and Azure Blackjack with unique rule tweaks. Payouts can reach 3:2 on natural blackjacks.

Plinko

This skill-based game involves dropping a plinko disc down a pyramid of pegs. Make precision drops to increase your chances of the disc landing in higher paying slots at the bottom for bigger prizes.

Baccarat

The classic casino game of baccarat offers some of the best odds at MetaWin. Back the Player or Banker hand as cards are dealt, with ties resulting in a push. Player bets pay 1:1 while Banker bets have a slightly higher 0.95:1 payout.

Live Casino

For a truly immersive experience, MetaWin lets you join real human dealers streamed in HD quality. Enjoy live baccarat, roulette, blackjack and more game show experiences like Mega Wheel directly from studio floors.

Metawin Sportsbook

The Metawin sportsbook is a recent addition to the site, offering a wide range of events and competitions despite the absence of specific bonus codes or deposit offers.

Partnering with Sportradar, Metawin provides an extensive selection of sports and esports markets. Users can enjoy pre-game and live betting options on major sports like soccer, football, basketball, and baseball, as well as niche sports and various esports titles.

The platform stands out with its impressive array of betting tools, including game tracking, stats, and predictions.

In terms of odds, Metawin proves competitive across most sports. Our comparison showed slightly better odds for pre-game markets in soccer, tennis, and football, while sports like basketball, boxing, and rugby matched up to competitors.

The betting interface centers around moneyline wagers, with easy access to other bet types such as spread, totals, and props through a convenient drop-down menu.

Metawin offers a wide range of futures and outright bets for major competitions across various sports.

Metawin’s modern, user-friendly platform comes equipped with several helpful features. These include efficient filtering tools, a search facility, a top bets panel, and a schedule that allows users to view upcoming events.

The platform also provides valuable insights and statistics for selected markets, aiding users in making informed predictions.

This combination of comprehensive markets, competitive odds, and user-friendly features positions Metawin as a solid choice for sports betting enthusiasts.

Other Products

Competitions

These are essentially blockchain-based lotteries with prize pools funded by ticket purchases. However, the results are determined transparently by smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain rather than a traditional lottery draw.

Each competition has a set number of tickets available for purchase at different price tiers. For example, you might be able to get 50 entries for 0.012 ETH or go bigger with 2,000 entries for 0.36 ETH.

The smart contracts then randomly select the winning tickets/wallets in a fully auditable and verifiable manner thanks to the transparency of the blockchain ledger.

Current competitions offer prize pools ranging from a couple of ETH up to jackpots worth thousands of dollars. And best of all, MetaWin provides every player with one free ticket just for joining the Telegram community!

By harnessing blockchain technology, MetaWin competitions guarantee true randomness and fairness that is open for verification by anyone. It adds an exciting crypto twist to lottery-style games.

NFT Prizes

In addition to ETH prizes, some MetaWin competitions let you win valuable NFT collectibles from popular collections like Beanz and Killabears that trade on marketplaces like OpenSea.

There’s even the ability to gain entries into these special NFT competitions by holding certain requisite NFTs from the collection. It’s an innovative way to engage existing NFT fans and collectors.

With NFTs being all the rage, scoring rare and valuable pieces through MetaWin’s smart competitions adds an element of gamification that blends perfectly with crypto gambling.

Welcome Bonuses

While most online casinos offer a standard deposit match bonus, MetaWin takes a different approach that’s tailored to its innovative blockchain competitions. Here’s how it works:

As soon as you connect your crypto wallet to MetaWin, you’ll automatically receive 1 free ticket entry to the current big prize competition running at the time.

For example, the most recent competition had a prize pool of 5 ETH (over $9,000 at current prices!). Just by signing up, you get a free lottery ticket for a chance to win that huge prize.

But MetaWin doesn’t stop there. You can then purchase additional entries at discounted rates to increase your odds significantly:

  • 50 additional entries for 0.012 ETH
  • 165 additional entries for 0.036 ETH
  • 780 additional entries for 0.156 ETH
  • 2,000 additional entries for 0.36 ETH

As you can see, the more entries you purchase, the bigger the discount per entry. So maximizing your investment can pay off massively if you hit that smart contract jackpot.

With each new competition cycle, the prize pools reset with new opportunities to win big payouts or rare NFTs just for joining.

How to Signup

Rather than a traditional account registration process, MetaWin just requires you to connect a cryptocurrency wallet to get started. Here are the steps:

  1. Visit the MetaWin website on your desktop or mobile device.
  2. Click the “Connect Wallet” button at the top.
  3. Choose which crypto wallet you want to use – MetaWin supports MetaMask, Coinbase Wallet, and over 300 other wallets through WalletConnect.
  4. For MetaMask, just approve the connection request in the wallet window that pops up.
  5. For WalletConnect, you’ll be shown a QR code to scan with your mobile wallet app.
  6. That’s it! Your wallet is now connected to MetaWin.

No personal information, email addresses or cumbersome sign-ups required. Simply connect an Ethereum wallet and you’re ready to play.

The connected wallet acts as your secure MetaWin account. Deposits and withdrawals happen instantly by transferring ETH to/from your wallet address. You can also participate in competitions and purchase entries directly from your wallet balance.

It’s a seamless and 100% anonymous process thanks to MetaWin’s decentralized blockchain platform. Sign up literally takes seconds while providing top-notch privacy and security.

Payment Methods

MetaWin makes it easy to deposit and withdraw using cryptocurrencies. Here are the deposit and withdrawal options:

Deposit Options

  • MetaMask Wallet
  • Coinbase Wallet
  • WalletConnect (Over 300+ Ethereum wallets supported)

To deposit, simply connect your preferred Ethereum wallet to the MetaWin platform. Once connected, you can instantly transfer ETH from your wallet balance into your MetaWin account with just a few clicks.

Withdrawal Options

  • Withdraw directly to your connected MetaMask Wallet
  • Withdraw directly to your connected Coinbase Wallet
  • Withdraw to any other Ethereum wallet address

For withdrawals, enter the ETH amount you wish to cash out and provide the destination wallet address you’d like to receive the funds. MetaWin will instantly transfer the ETH on-chain from their side, giving you access to your winnings securely and anonymously.

All transactions occur on the Ethereum blockchain, providing transparency while upholding MetaWin’s core values of anonymity, security and efficiency. While currently only ETH is accepted, the platform may add support for other major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin in the future.

Is MetaWin Casino Legit?

Decentralized and Anonymous

  • MetaWin operates as a fully decentralized casino on the Ethereum blockchain
  • Allows completely anonymous gambling without account registration or KYC
  • Players simply connect an Ethereum wallet like MetaMask to get started

Transparent and Provably Fair

  • Casino games are provided by regulated developer Pragmatic Play
  • Competition outcomes are determined transparently by Ethereum smart contracts
  • All transactions are recorded publicly and permanently on the blockchain

Secure Cryptocurrency Integration

  • MetaWin only accepts Ethereum (ETH) for deposits and withdrawals
  • Transactions occur directly between the player’s crypto wallet and MetaWin
  • Utilizes industry-standard encryption and security protocols

Player Protections

  • No personal or financial information is ever required or stored
  • Players control and custody their own funds in private wallets
  • Blockchain-based competitions guarantee true randomness and fairness

Innovative Experience

  • First-of-its-kind anonymous, Web3 cryptocurrency gambling platform
  • Unique opportunities to win big ETH prizes through blockchain competitions
  • Ability to win rare NFTs from popular collections like Beanz and Killabears

While operating outside of traditional gambling regulations, MetaWin delivers a provably fair, secure, and transparently verifiable casino experience through its pioneering use of Ethereum blockchain technology.

With games from reputable developers, anonymous wallets, instant payouts, and innovative features like smart contract competitions, MetaWin offers a legitimate way to gamble online with cryptocurrencies.

Is MetaWin Casino Safe to Use?

Blockchain-Based Security

  • All transactions and gaming activity occur on the secure Ethereum blockchain
  • Players retain full custody of their funds in private crypto wallets
  • No sensitive personal or financial information is ever required or stored

Anonymous and Private

  • No account registration, personal details, or KYC verification needed
  • MetaWin does not collect, store or have access to any identifying user data
  • Players can gamble completely anonymously just by connecting a wallet

Verified Fair Gaming

  • Casino games are provided by regulated developer Pragmatic Play
  • Outcomes of blockchain competitions are determined by auditable smart contracts
  • True randomness and fairness is cryptographically ensured on the blockchain

Established Partners

  • MetaMask and Coinbase are trusted wallets integrated for secure deposits/withdrawals
  • Pragmatic Play is a leading casino games provider with a solid reputation

Secure Transactions

  • Only Ethereum (ETH) is accepted, utilizing military-grade encryption
  • Funds are transferred directly between the player’s wallet and MetaWin
  • No third-parties have access to transaction information

While operating outside of traditional gambling licensing, MetaWin is built from the ground up with security in mind through its blockchain-native architecture.

With anonymous wallets, fair gaming, and encryption, players can safely enjoy MetaWin’s innovative crypto gambling experience without risking their funds or privacy.

Design & Usability

MetaWin has a clean and modern website design that makes it easy to navigate the platform’s different sections like slots, table games, live casino, and competitions. The minimalist user interface puts the focus squarely on the games and features, creating an uncluttered experience.

That said, the website can feel a bit bare-bones at times due to its stripped-back, decentralized nature. There aren’t a ton of flashy graphics or extraneous visual elements, which some users may see as a pro or con depending on their preferences.

The use of WebGL and live animations does give the game lobbies a more dynamic feel, while still maintaining performance nicely across devices. You’ll see things like the roulette wheel spinning in the background as you browse game options.

Usability is well thought out, with handy filter and sorting options that let you quickly find the type of game you’re looking for, whether that’s Megaways slots, specific table games like baccarat, or titles from certain providers. The favorites system is also convenient for keeping your preferred games organized.

For a Web3 crypto platform, MetaWin has achieved a great balance between an easy-to-use interface and giving users all the benefits of blockchain like transparency and verifiability.

Members Area

MetaWin takes a unique approach to its “members area” by leveraging blockchain technology and crypto wallets. Rather than a traditional account system, your Ethereum wallet essentially becomes your MetaWin account when you connect it to the platform.

Once your wallet like MetaMask is securely linked, you’ll have access to MetaWin’s full suite of games, competitions, and features. Your wallet address serves as your identifier, with all transactions, winnings, tickets, and NFT prizes directly deposited to your wallet’s balance.

The members area experience is quite stripped back compared to conventional online casinos. There are no bloated account sections or pages full of personal details and payment info. Everything is kept anonymous through your encrypted wallet connection.

However, you still get a handy dashboard view that lets you track your gameplay activity, competition entries, current wallet balance, and any NFTs you may have won. This members overview area provides all the essential data you need about your MetaWin gaming in a clean, easy-to-digest interface.

You can also quickly jump to the game lobbies, hop into competitions, purchase additional entries, or withdraw winnings straight from this main account area with just a couple clicks. It’s a lean experience free of clutter, putting the focus on gaming and prizes.

Mobile Offering

Rather than having dedicated iOS or Android apps, MetaWin has been optimized to work seamlessly on mobile web browsers across all devices and operating systems.

Simply navigate to the MetaWin website from your smartphone or tablet’s web browser and you’ll be automatically loaded into the mobile-friendly version of the platform.

The entire site has been designed responsively to provide an ideal user experience no matter the screen size or aspect ratio. All the games, features, and account areas translate perfectly to mobile layouts.

You’ll be able to easily browse game lobbies, with smart filtering and sorting options that make finding your preferred slots, tables, or live dealer games a breeze on mobile. Game launches are lightning fast with no bulky plugins required.

Connecting your crypto wallet like MetaMask is just as straightforward on mobile as desktop. Most mobile wallets can simply scan the provided QR code for effortless linking to MetaWin.

From there, you can make instant deposits, purchase competition entries, gamble, and cash out winnings all within your mobile browser. No downloads or installs needed – just MetaWin’s sleek mobile web interface.

The clean, stripped-back design philosophy helps deliver an incredibly smooth and lightweight user experience optimized for mobile data and connectivity.

Ease of Use

One of MetaWin’s biggest strengths is its sheer simplicity and ease of use. The entire platform has been designed around providing an effortless web3 gambling experience that leverages the advantages of blockchain technology.

Getting started takes just seconds. There’s no lengthy signup process or account registrations. All you need to do is connect your existing Ethereum wallet like MetaMask to the MetaWin website with a couple clicks. Your wallet acts as your secure, anonymous ID.

From there, the user experience is extremely intuitive. The clean website layout makes it easy to find and filter through the various game lobbies for slots, tables, live casino, and more. Descriptions and instructions are clear and straightforward.

Actually placing wagers is as simple as can be, with no convoluted payment flows. Since you’re betting with the ETH already loaded in your connected wallet, you can start playing games instantly. Winnings are automatically credited back to your wallet’s balance.

Purchasing entries for the innovative blockchain competitions works in the same seamless fashion. You can buy tickets directly from your wallet balance with just a few clicks.

Withdrawing is also hassle-free with no lengthy cashout periods. You can instantly transfer your ETH winnings from MetaWin directly back into your personal crypto wallet whenever desired.

Customer Support

Despite its streamlined, decentralized approach, MetaWin does not sacrifice quality customer service. Players have multiple channels to get timely assistance whenever needed.

Email Support

For general inquiries or more complex issues, you can email the MetaWin support team directly at support@metawin.com. They strive to respond to all emails within 24 hours during normal operating hours.

FAQ Section

MetaWin also provides a comprehensive FAQ hub covering common questions about the site’s features, security, games, and more. This is an excellent self-service resource for quickly finding answers to basic queries on your own.

While phone support is not provided, the email, live chat, and FAQ options should sufficiently cover most customer service needs that may arise during gameplay at this web3 crypto casino.

Conclusion

MetaWin is truly blazing a new trail in the world of online crypto gambling. This pioneering platform leverages blockchain technology to deliver an anonymous, secure, and provably fair gaming experience like no other.

From just connecting your Ethereum wallet, a world of possibilities opens up. You can enjoy slots, table games, live dealer tables, jackpots and more from trusted developers like Pragmatic Play. All while maintaining complete privacy by never having to provide any personal information.

MetaWin’s real innovation shines through its unique blockchain competitions and opportunities to win big ETH prizes and coveted NFTs through transparent smart contracts. The random, cryptographically-verifiable results of these events guarantee a level playing field.

Add in benefits like instant, fee-free payouts directly to your wallet and MetaWin provides a glimpse into the future of web3 gaming. An experience built on the fundamentals of anonymity, autonomy and decentralization.

For those who have been patiently waiting for a way to enjoy casino games, enter thrilling competitions, and potentially win big all while taking advantage of crypto’s inherent privacy and security benefits – MetaWin delivers an unparalleled solution.

Visit MetaWin

FAQs

Q: Is MetaWin licensed and regulated?

A: No, MetaWin operates outside of traditional gambling regulations and licensing jurisdictions. As a decentralized crypto casino, its operations are facilitated directly on the Ethereum blockchain in an anonymous manner.

Q: How do I get started playing at MetaWin?

A: Simply connect your Ethereum wallet like MetaMask to the MetaWin website. There is no account registration or personal details required. Your linked wallet serves as your secure, anonymous account.

Q: What cryptocurrencies does MetaWin accept?

A: Currently, MetaWin only supports Ethereum (ETH) for deposits, withdrawals and playing games. They may add support for other major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin in the future.

Q: How can I deposit and withdraw funds?

A: To deposit, you’ll transfer ETH directly from your connected crypto wallet’s balance into MetaWin. To withdraw winnings, you’ll transfer the ETH from your MetaWin account back into your personal wallet.

Q: Are the games at MetaWin fair and random?

A: Yes, the instant casino games are provided by regulated developer Pragmatic Play. MetaWin’s unique blockchain competitions also guarantee randomness and fairness through verifiable smart contracts executed on Ethereum.

Q: Can I access MetaWin from my mobile device?

A: Yes, the MetaWin platform is fully optimized to work seamlessly on mobile web browsers across all devices and operating systems. No app downloads are required.

Q: What types of games does MetaWin offer?

A: MetaWin provides slots, table games like blackjack and roulette, live dealer casino games, and innovative blockchain competitions where you can win ETH prizes and NFTs.

item.content:encoded:
Bursting onto the scene in 2022, the neon-bathed halls of JackBit aim to dazzle crypto gamblers with offerings galore. You’ll find everything under the sun here – slots, blackjack, roulette, live dealers, niche sports, esports, instant lottery, and more.

In this comprehensive review, we’ll tour all the nooks and crannies that make JackBit shine so brightly from its game variety and live streaming to its stellar customer support. You’ll get the full breakdown on banking options, mobile compatibility, and more so you can determine if this crypto casino and sports betting site is for you.

Let’s go…

Visit JackBit

If you use our link to signup you will get: 100% Bonus 100 Free Spins!

Quick Verdict: A crypto gaming hub packing thousands of slots, live dealers, niche sports, and instant withdrawals alongside player anonymity, JackBit Casino delivers versatile entertainment and innovations.

JackBit Casino Games

Slots

With over 6,000 slot titles, JackBit is a veritable slot paradise for reel spinners. You’ll find the hottest new video slot releases from major developers like Pragmatic Play, Play’n GO, and Yggdrasil alongside classic 3-reel slots and fruity machines. Themes range from magical worlds with sorcerers and dragons to gritty crime capers, making slots suitable for all interests. Jackpots also climb into the millions, offering life-changing wins.

Popular Titles: Wolf Gold, Money Train 2, Sweet Bonanza, Book of Dead

Blackjack

Offering around 50 variants, blackjack fans have their pick of rule sets and twists on the classic game at JackBit. Play popular options like European Blackjack, Single Deck Blackjack, and Blackjack Surrender. Or try unique creations like Blackjack Perfect Pairs, Blackjack Switch, and Pontoon. No matter your preferred strategy, JackBit has a seat for you at the virtual blackjack tables.

Popular Titles: European Blackjack, Pontoon, Blackjack Surrender, Perfect Pairs

Roulette

It wouldn’t be a proper casino without roulette, and JackBit delivers with almost 60 variants. Test your luck predicting which pocket the ball will land in across European, American, French, and 3D roulette. Seek bigger payouts by betting on hot and cold numbers or try inventive mashups like Roulette Diamond Edition.

Popular Titles: European Roulette, American Roulette, French Roulette, 3D Roulette

Live Casino

Games When you crave real human interaction mixed in with your bets, JackBit’s live dealer lobby sets the stage. Stream tables in real time where professional croupiers host games like baccarat, blackjack, roulette and poker. Chatter with other players and the dealer as you watch cards be dealt and wheels get spun, just like an elegant casino floor.

Popular Tables: Live Blackjack, Live Roulette, Live Baccarat, Live Poker

Game Shows

For lively entertainment alongside betting, interactive Game Shows are broadcast live every few minutes at JackBit. Test your trivia in favorites like Monopoly Live and Cash or Crash. Spin for big bonus prizes in Wheel of Fortune style games too. The variety ensures you’ll stay engaged for hours.

Popular Titles: Monopoly Live, Crazy Time, Mega Wheel, Deal or No Deal

JackBit Sports Betting

Mainstream Sports

JackBit covers all major league sports like soccer, basketball, American football, baseball, tennis, cricket, and more. You can bet on spreads, moneylines, totals, props, and live in-play wagers. Less mainstream sports are featured too including volleyball, Aussie rules football, cycling, dart, snooker, and even ski jumping.

Esports

With coverage of 8+ top esports, JackBit is a premier destination for esports betting. All the most popular titles are featured like League of Legends, CS:GO, Dota 2, and Call of Duty. Bet on match winners, handicaps, over/under totals, and specials on individual player performances. Live streams ensure you don’t miss the action.

Horse Racing

Gallop into the JackBit racebook to bet on horses, greyhounds, and harness racing from tracks around the globe. Events are held nearly around the clock, including options from the UK, Ireland, Australia, USA and more. Bet to Win, Place, or Show plus specialty exotic wagers and parlays.

Specialty Bets

In addition to normal sports contests, JackBit allows betting on specials including entertainment outcomes. Wager on who will win major awards shows or competitions like the BBC Sports Personality of the Year, Eurovision, and more. Politics betting also features odds on elections and other governmental outcomes.

Other Products

Mini Games

For casual entertainment, JackBit features 14 original mini games you won’t find anywhere else. These simple arcade-style games include titles like Dino, a crash-style game; Chicken, where you try to hatch eggs; and Plinko, the classic pegboard game. The simplicity makes them fun to play in short bursts when you need a quick gaming break.

Lotto Games

Try your hand at virtual lotto betting on various jackpot drawings every few minutes. Pick your lucky numbers and wait for the animated draw to see if you matched enough to win prizes. Options include Keno Lotto and Rapidlotto along with scratch card simulations. While not as complex as casino games, these quick lotteries provide another way to win.

Shooting Games

Let off some steam by engaging in first-person shooter style games that resemble arcade installations. Games like X Chicken and Double Shot offer quick paced shooting action paired with betting on your final score and other metrics. It’s a unique mashup if you want to combine gambling with sharpshooting skills.

JackBit Welcome Bonuses

Jackbit offers 100% No Risk bonus for sports wagering, they also offer you 100 free spins at the casino.

Now 100 spins may seem small, but there’s a key difference – JackBit’s free spins come with zero wagering requirements. Anything you win is yours to keep.

Over in the sportsbook, JackBit also impresses with the creative “Betting 3+1” promotion. Place three straight bets and your fourth wager comes free, with the value determined by the average stake of your three preceding bets. This free play is yours to use on any sport with no limitations. Bettors can redeem this offer once daily.

How to Signup

Signing up at JackBit is a quick and easy process:

  1. Visit JackBit.com and click “Sign Up” in the top right corner
  2. Enter your email, desired password, and preferred currency
  3. Tick the box to confirm you are 18+ years old and have read the Terms & Conditions
  4. Click the verification link sent to your email to activate your new account

And that’s it! Account creation takes just seconds.

With sign-ups requiring only an email and password, JackBit does not ask for any personal details or documents during registration. You can enjoy complete anonymity.

Once your account is verified via email, head to the cashier to deposit funds and claim your 50 free spins welcome offer with bonus code WELCOME.

You’ll then be all set to explore thousands of casino games and sports betting markets across JackBit’s impressive crypto gambling site. Their instant withdrawals and lack of KYC checks make the entire process hassle-free. Sign up today to unlock your entertainment now!

JackBit Promotions and Loyalty Program

Recurring Promotions

While the welcome offer is modest, JackBit builds value through a selection of solid recurring deals – especially for sports bettors.

The aforementioned ‘Betting 3+1’ promotion gifts players a free bet equal to the average of their 3 previous wagers once daily. This free play can be used on any sport and has no wagering restrictions.

JackBit also offers 10% bet insurance on 4+ leg accumulator bets. If just one selection loses, 10% of your total bet amount is refunded in bonus funds.

There are currently no ongoing reload bonuses or free spin packages for casino players. But slot tournament and prize drop leaderboards help loyal players pad their balances by competing against others.

Loyalty & Rakeback Program

All players earn loyalty points as they bet, which drive JackBit’s cashback-style rewards program. The more points accrued, the higher your status tier, ranging from Rookie to Legend.

Higher tiers unlock increased rakeback rates across different JackBit gambling verticals. For instance, Rookie status earns 20% rakeback on sports bets, while the Legend tier takes 50%. Rakeback applies to casino gaming too, ranging from 10% to 30%.

Loyalty points can be exchanged for bonus cash at a rate of 100 points = $1. The program incentivizes larger wagers but offers no playthrough on redeemed rakeback sums before withdrawing.

Is JackBit Legit?

Licensing JackBit holds a valid gambling license issued by the Curacao Gambling Commission, under gaming license number 1668/JAZ. This license means the site adheres to strict regulations surrounding player safety and fairness.

Operator Reputation The casino is owned and operated by Ryker B.V., an established iGaming company also behind other reputable casino brands. Ryker possesses years of experience running legal, above-board wagering sites.

Data Security JackBit employs strong encryption technology such as SSL computer data transfer protocols to keep player accounts and information private and secure. Financial transactions are also secured by additional layering.

Game Integrity The site’s expansive library of slots, table games, live dealers, and more hails from over 100 of the industry’s leading game developers including giants like Evolution and Microgaming who must meet high integrity standards.

Responsible Gambling Tools JackBit provides self-exclusion options and supplies resources warning that gambling should not be viewed as financial recourse. These consumer protections promote accountability.

In summary, JackBit engages extensive licensing oversight, partners with respected operators, implements security measures, sources trustworthy games, and offers accountability tools indicative of a safe, legal site.

Is JackBit Safe to Use?

Yes, JackBit Casino utilizes various safety measures and security protocols to protect player data and funds, making it generally safe to use.

Specifically, here are some of the key safety and security practices implemented by JackBit:

  • SSL Encryption – The site employs 128-bit SSL encryption on all connections to scramble transmitted data. This prevents unauthorized capture of sensitive account details during transfer.
  • Secure Hosting Infrastructure – Server platforms hosting the site utilize intrusion prevention/firewall systems plus safeguarded authentication controls and redundancy to block cyberattacks.
  • Anonymity – A lack of mandatory KYC checks allied with primarily crypto banking options allows player anonymity regarding stored data. This enhances privacy.
  • Responsible Gambling Tools – Players can self-exclude and set deposit limits. Messaging also directs users toward ethical gambling behavior for account safety.
  • Licensed Curaçao Operation – Adhering to the oversight and accountability standards required under its gaming license adds another layer of consumer protection.
  • Solid Reputation – A track record of paying players promptly without major complaints or scandal speaks well to apparent operational integrity and safety.

In summary, JackBit appears to implement robust systems and leverage operational transparency to stabilize platform security, making the casino safer for players in the emerging crypto sector. Users should still exercise personal responsibility too.

JackBit Design & Usability

Aesthetic The casino opts for a stylish, tech-inspired look using 3D graphics, floating crypto icons, and bright pops of neon purples, greens and pinks across menus. This creates an inviting, futuristic ambiance.

  • Site Navigation – Logical and consistent layouts allow seamless site navigation. Side menus and header links effectively distribute key sections while floating widgets direct players to promotions. The lobby also contains game sorting tools.
  • Responsiveness – JackBit’s mobile-optimized site works flawlessly on iOS and Android devices without losing functionality. Players can easily deposit, play games and manage their account on the go through the mobile site.

JackBit Customer Support

But JackBit’s reliable live chat capability provides the most vital lifeline for timely assistance when issues surface during real money play. For casual queries, help archives also answer effectively.

Visit JackBit

Conclusion

JackBit Casino represents an impressive new entry into the expanding world of crypto casinos, having carved out a niche for it in small amount of time. Its neon-bathed site strikes all the right notes regarding design with slick aesthetics and logical navigation.

The sheer depth of gambling variety particularly impresses, blending a monumental game library spanning thousands of slots, dozens of table options, live dealer streaming and even specialty mini-games with a massive sportsbook accepting bets across 40+ leagues and events.

item.content:encoded:
Immerion Casino is an exciting new online gambling destination that offers an exceptional experience for players.

Add in generous promotions, quick payouts, top-notch security, and responsive customer service, and it’s clear why Immerion is quickly becoming a top choice for discerning online gamblers.

With frequent jackpot hits on the site, you’ll have ample chances to become an instant millionaire.

The poker games are rendered in superb quality with realistic animations and sound effects. With options for multi-hand and multi-table play, Immerion poker games will test your skills.

The dealers keep the action lively with friendly banter and frequent multipliers and bonus games. It’s an immersive experience that brings the thrills of the Strip right to your device.

Adding some healthy competition, Immerion casino hosts frequent tournaments that allow you to go for prize pool glory.

The site currently has a $100,000 tournament running until the end of the month, with the top 10 finishers on the leaderboard earning cash prizes. Buy-ins start at just $0.10, making it accessible to players of all bankrolls.

Tournaments span all types of games like slots, poker, baccarat and more. This allows you to compete against other skilled players for chances at the big scores.

Immerion does a great job tracking tournament progress in real-time, so you’ll always know where you stand. Few things are as rewarding as climbing the leaderboard through skilled, strategic play.

Welcome Bonuses

New players at Immerion Casino are greeted with a warm welcome in the form of a generous 4-part deposit match bonus package. This allows you to supercharge your starting bankroll right from the get-go.

Here’s how the bonuses break down…

Welcome pack 500%

The bonus funds come with fair 30x wagering requirements before withdrawing. And Immerion allows you to work through the playthrough across all games rather than just slots.

With such a lucrative welcome offer up for grabs, new players would be wise to make the most of boosting their starting bankroll at this top-rated online casino. Few sites can match Immerion’s generosity for newcomers.

How to Signup

Signing up at Immerion Casino is refreshingly simple and straightforward. Here’s how to get started:

Cashing out your winnings is just as fast and easy. Simply navigate to the cashier section of your account and input which crypto you’d like to withdraw to and the amount. For those who prefer traditional payment methods, credit/debit cards and bank transfers are also accepted at Immerion Casino. However, crypto clearly takes center stage as the recommended option for the smoothest and most secure transactions.

Is it Legit?

  • As a newly established brand in 2023, Immerion Casino hasn’t had years to build an extensive reputation and track record yet. However, the professional management team behind the casino inspires confidence that they will consistently deliver a high-quality, secure gaming experience adhering to industry best practices.

Fairness of Games

  • Immerion partners exclusively with elite, reputable game providers like Pragmatic Play, Evolution Gaming, and Yggdrasil. These companies are renowned for ensuring provably fair gaming across their robust libraries.
  • Standard mechanisms like regular independent game testing and certification are likely implemented to maintain true randomness and fairness.

Security and Payments

  • Immerion utilizes robust encryption protocols and security measures to protect all player data and financial transactions from being compromised.
  • Their cryptocurrency banking options enable fully secure and anonymous payments and withdrawals.
  • Players can take advantage of generous promotions like the 20% daily cashback and lucrative welcome package.

Responsible Gambling

  • While actively promoting responsible gambling practices, Immerion allows players to easily set deposit/wager limits or self-exclude their accounts if needed.

Is it Safe to Use?

Licensing and Regulation

  • Immerion Casino operates under a legitimate online gambling license from the Seychelles Financial Services Authority, ensuring its operations adhere to strict regulatory standards for safety and fair gaming practices.

Data Security

  • The casino employs robust encryption technologies and advanced security protocols to fully protect all player data and financial transactions from any potential threats or breaches.
  • As a cryptocurrency-focused platform, Immerion enables secure and anonymous banking options.

Fair Gaming Certification

  • Immerion partners exclusively with elite, reputable gaming providers like Pragmatic Play, Evolution, and Yggdrasil who are regularly audited and certified for provably fair gaming across their robust libraries.
  • Mechanisms like regular independent game testing are likely implemented to verify true randomness and fairness.

Responsible Gambling Tools

  • Immerion is fully committed to enabling responsible gambling by providing tools for players to set deposit/wager limits, self-exclude accounts, view gambling history, and access help resources.

Safe Payments

  • Cryptocurrency banking ensures fully secure and anonymous payments and withdrawals at Immerion Casino with no risk of financial fraud or identity theft.
  • Players can deposit and cash out safely and reliably using popular crypto like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin and more.

Overall, Immerion Casino checks all the boxes when it comes to operating a safe, secure and legitimately licensed online gambling platform that prioritizes player protection.

Design & Usability

Immerion Casino has clearly put a strong emphasis on crafting an exceptional user experience through its clean, intuitive design and thoughtful user interface. From the moment you arrive on the site, you’re greeted by a sleek, modern aesthetic that makes an excellent first impression.

The layout is neatly organized with a sidebar providing quick access to the diverse game lobbies and categories. This allows you to easily find the types of games you want to play with just a click or two. The filtering options go even further by letting you narrow down slot results by provider, features, gameplay characteristics and more.

The actual gameplay experience is just as polished across both desktop and mobile devices. The games themselves load quickly with no lagging or stuttering. The controls are smooth and responsive whether spinning slots, placing bets or interacting with live dealers. Overall navigation between games and casino areas like cashier and support is seamless.

Small design touches really elevate Immerion’s user-friendly feel. The ability to open games in a new window or view mode with a click is convenient. Having instant access to your account balance, cashier, and rewards from the top navigation bar is great too.

Perhaps most impressively, Immerion manages to integrate a vast number of games and features into its platform without ever feeling bloated or cluttered. The design effectively scales to provide an optimal experience whether playing on a desktop, tablet or smartphone.

By prioritizing these core principles of modern design and usability, Immerion Casino has created an online gambling destination that just feels pleasantly streamlined to navigate and enjoy from the moment you arrive.

While Immerion Casino doesn’t have a traditional “members area” in the sense of a separate exclusive player’s lounge or account section, it does provide all the key functionality and access you’d want directly integrated into its main platform.

Telephone

While not heavily advertised, Immerion does provide a customer support telephone number that can be obtained by contacting them through other channels. Phone support offers a convenient option for more personal assistance.

Conclusion

Immerion Casino is a top-tier online gambling destination that seamlessly blends an exceptional game library, innovative promotions, and a truly user-friendly experience. The standout promotions like the 20% daily cashback and thrill of the “Engine of Fortune” spins keep excitement and value levels high. Generous welcome package offers allow newcomers to supercharge their starting bankrolls significantly as well.

The site has a sleek design, intuitive navigation, and seamless gameplay across desktop and mobile. The platform’s crypto-focus facilitates lightning-fast, secure banking without any arduous verification requirements. If assistance is ever needed, 24/7 multilingual support is just a click away.

With its professional operations and legitimate licensing from Seychelles authorities, Immerion Casino has quickly established itself as a safe, entertaining and rewarding online gaming environment that checks every box for the discerning player. It’s an online casino well worth experiencing.

item.content:encoded:
Flush Casino launched in 2021 as a new crypto-focused online casino, and has quickly established itself as a top destination for players looking to wager with digital currencies. Fully licensed and regulated under the jurisdiction of Curacao, Flush Casino offers a modern, feature-rich experience for both new and veteran gamblers alike.

Flush Casino clearly sets its sights high intending to disrupt expectations of what an internet casino can deliver. But does reality align with the lofty vision?

In our full review, we rigorously assess every key area – bonuses, games variety spanning slots, tables, live dealers and more along with crypto transaction ease, security, mobile play access and extra perks distinguishing Flush Casino as an emerging industry leader.

As always, we signup and test casinos with real money deposits to make a full & fair assessment.

Read on for the complete breakdown…

Visit Flush Casino

If you use our link to signup you will get: 150% Bonus on Your First Deposits

Quick Verdict: Flush Casino is a top-tier crypto-only online casino featuring over 5,500 games, lucrative welcome bonuses up to $1,000, and instant payouts across 9 popular cryptocurrencies.

Quick Facts

Category Information
Established 2021
License Curacao
Games Over 5,500 from 35+ providers
Software Providers Evolution, NetEnt, Betsoft, Pragmatic Play, and more
Bonuses Two-tier welcome bonus up to $1,000

Withdrawal Times Instant

Flush Casino Games

When Flush Casino says it offers over 5,500 casino games, it’s not an exaggeration. The sheer depth and variety of the games library is staggering for an online casino, spanning all major categories and featuring top-tier software providers. Players can easily spend hours exploring the different game types and finding new favorites.

Slots

With close to 4,000 slot games, this category dominates at Flush Casino. Find all your classic 3-reel and 5-reel slots along latest video slot releases. Popular titles like Starburst, Gonzo’s Quest, Book of Dead or Wolf Gold are present, along with uniquely themed games covering holidays, magic, fantasy, ancient mythology, vampires, gods, comic books and more. You’re certain to uncover gems you’ve never seen on other casino sites.

The slots selection truly shines when digging deeper though. Niche favorites like bingo slots, megaways slots with 100,000+ paylines, three dimensional slots featuring glasses-free 3D graphics, and more are in ample supply. The site also separates slots nicely into useful categories, allowing you to filter by features like locked wilds, tumbling wins, cluster pays, and other innovative slot mechanics that change how the games work.

Jackpot hunters are covered too with hundreds of progressive slot titles to choose from, some featuring 8-figure top prizes just waiting to pay out massive, life-altering winnings to lucky players.

Table Games

Roulette, blackjack, baccarat and poker fans will think they died and went to heaven at Flush Casino. Each category holds dozens of unique variants to match any playstyle or preference imaginable. Play single zero European roulette or double zero American roulette. Or mix things up with multi-wheel, multiplayer and instant win roulette games if that’s your thing.

The same holds for blackjack with an endless array of options – play the popular Atlantic City rules or switch it up to Single Deck, Double Exposure, Perfect Pairs and beyond. Baccarat brings Point Squeeze, Control Squeeze and No Commission options too while poker provides Three Card, Let It Ride, Hold Em, Oasis Poker and more.

These are just a sampling as virtually any table game type you can envision is likely present at Flush Casino thanks to using software from the best providers in the industry like Evolution, NetEnt, Microgaming, Play’N GO and Betsoft among dozens of others.

Specialty Games

Beyond mainstream slots, table games and live dealer, Flush Casino serves up specialty game options galore in their dedicated Specialty category. Games here don’t easily fit under standard labels but provide plenty of fun with titles frequently not found at competing casinos.

Dice games, bingo games, lottery simulators, arcade style games and even fan favorite game shows all make appearances. There’s also entire sections for scratch cards and keno games to enjoy.

Live Dealer

For the live casino experience that offers real time engagement, players head over to the Live Dealer zone. This area hosts professional human dealers in real casinos dealing out hands of blackjack, poker and roulette as well as operating the iconic Money Wheel. item.content:encoded:
If you’re familiar with internet meme culture and the world of cryptocurrencies, you’ve likely heard of the Wall Street Memes project and its native WSM token.

Building on the success of one of 2023’s biggest crypto presales, the team behind Wall Street Memes has launched an innovative online casino that perfectly blends the themes of finance, cryptocurrency, and internet memes.

Wall Street Memes Casino aims to provide an exciting and unique gambling experience tailored specifically for the crypto community. With a massive game library, lucrative bonuses, diverse cryptocurrency support, and a fully integrated sportsbook, this platform is quickly making waves in the online gambling sphere.

In this comprehensive review, we’ll dive deep into every aspect of Wall Street Memes Casino, evaluating its offerings, features, strengths, and potential drawbacks.

Visit Wall Street Memes Casino

Quick Verdict: Wall Street Memes Casino is a brand new crypto gambling site that blends a massive game library of over 5,000 titles, generous bonuses & fast payouts to provide an immersive experience tailored for the crypto community.

Live Casino

For those seeking an authentic and immersive gambling experience, Wall Street Memes Casino offers a stellar live casino section. Powered by industry giants like Evolution Gaming and Ezugi, players can enjoy a wide range of live dealer games, including blackjack, roulette, baccarat, and poker variants. Professionally trained dealers operate from state-of-the-art studios, delivering a realistic casino atmosphere right to your screen.

Game Shows

Adding to the excitement, Wall Street Memes Casino features an array of game show-style offerings. These interactive and entertaining games combine elements of luck, skill, and showmanship. Players can participate in popular titles like Crazy Time, Dream Catcher, and Monopoly Live, where they can potentially win massive prizes while enjoying a thrilling game show experience.

Crash Games

A unique category at Wall Street Memes Casino is the Crash Games section, which includes provably fair games like Aviator, Rocket Crash, and Mines. These fast-paced and adrenaline-pumping games involve predicting the precise moment when the game “crashes,” providing an exhilarating gambling experience for those seeking high-stakes excitement.

In addition to its impressive casino offerings, Wall Street Memes Casino has integrated a fully-fledged sportsbook, catering to the needs of sports enthusiasts and betting aficionados alike.

From mainstream sports like soccer, basketball, football, and tennis to niche markets like esports, virtual sports, and even political events, the variety is truly remarkable.

One of the standout features of the sportsbook is its live in-play betting capability. Bettors can place wagers on ongoing matches and events, with odds and markets constantly updating in real-time. This feature adds an extra layer of excitement and allows bettors to capitalize on shifting momentum and match developments as they unfold.

Competitive Odds

Wall Street Memes Casino prides itself on offering competitive odds across various sports markets. While the odds may vary slightly for specific matches or events, they generally align with industry standards, ensuring that bettors have a fair chance of securing substantial payouts.

User-Friendly Interface

The sportsbook interface is designed with user-friendliness in mind. Additionally, the “My Bets” section provides a convenient way to track all active and settled wagers, enhancing the overall betting experience.

Other Products

Wall Street Memes Casino is closely connected to the Wall Street Memes (WSM) ecosystem and its native WSM cryptocurrency token. This token serves multiple purposes within the casino platform.

WSM can be used to deposit funds into your casino account, unlocking exclusive bonuses like the 200 free spins offered in the welcome package.

A portion of the casino’s profits are allocated to repurchasing WSM tokens from exchanges. This buyback reduces circulating supply and potentially increases the token’s value for holders.

Transparency

Holding WSM tokens can grant access to exclusive rewards, VIP programs, or unique gamification features within the casino ecosystem.

Welcome Bonuses

Wall Street Memes Casino offers an enticing welcome bonus package designed to attract new players and provide them with an exciting head start. This generous promotion aims to enhance the gaming experience right from the get-go.

The centerpiece of the welcome package is a massive 200% deposit match bonus, with a maximum bonus amount of $25,000. This means that if a player deposits $12,500, they will receive an additional $25,000 in bonus funds, effectively tripling their bankroll.

Like most casino bonuses, the welcome package at Wall Street Memes Casino comes with wagering requirements that must be met before any winnings can be withdrawn. The unique aspect of this bonus is the way the wagering requirements are structured.

For every 6 times the initial deposit amount is wagered, 10% of the bonus funds are released. This means that players have the opportunity to gradually unlock portions of the bonus as they continue playing, rather than having to meet the full wagering requirements in one go.

The registration process at Wall Street Memes Casino is designed to be quick and hassle-free, taking approximately 20 seconds to complete.

  1. Visit the Wall Street Memes Casino website.
  2. Click on the “Sign Up” or “Register” button, typically located in the top-right corner of the homepage.
  3. Enter a username of your choice and a valid email address. No other personal information is required.
  4. Create a secure password for your account.
  5. Agree to the casino’s terms and conditions.
  6. Complete the sign-up process by clicking the appropriate button.

That’s it! You’ve successfully created your Wall Street Memes Casino account without the need for any cumbersome verification or KYC (Know Your Customer) procedures.

Once your account is set up, you can proceed to deposit funds using any of the supported cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin, and the native WSM token. The minimum deposit amount varies depending on the chosen cryptocurrency but can be as low as 0.0001 BTC (approximately $3-4).

With its straightforward sign-up process and the option for anonymous play up to a certain limit, Wall Street

Wall Street Memes has partnered with Pragmatic Play to offer this $2 million prize pool promotion. Players earn tournament points by playing eligible Pragmatic slots with bets over $0.50. Higher value wins give more points.

At the end of each month, prizes from $10 to $25,000 are paid out to the players with the most points accumulated. No opt-in is required.

VIP & Loyalty Program

There are 11 ascending VIP tiers based on the amount wagered over time. Higher tiers unlock better rewards like cash rebates, prize draw entries and exclusive bonus offers.

Players also earn loyalty points on every real money wager. These can be redeemed for bonus funds or used to enter special loyalty promotions and prize draws.

Completing missions and challenges is another way to rapidly earn loyalty points and climb the VIP levels faster.

Payment Methods

  • Ripple (XRP)

No fees are charged by Wall Street Memes Casino for crypto withdrawals. However, standard blockchain network fees may apply depending on the cryptocurrency.

Is Wall Street Memes Casino Legit?

When considering if Wall Street Memes Casino is a legitimate and safe place to play online casino games, there are some important factors to evaluate:

  • Provably fair games like crashes and dice are also offered

  • Allows anonymous play without KYC up to deposit limits

Responsible Gambling

  • No specific responsible gambling resources currently advertised

Is Wall Street Memes Casino Safe to Use?

When considering the safety of Wall Street Memes Casino for real money play, there are several key factors to evaluate:

  • Wall Street Memes utilizes SSL encryption to secure data transfers
  • Connection is encrypted and verified by a trusted SSL certificate authority

Design & Usability

Wall Street Memes Casino has put a lot of effort into its website design and user experience. The site has a very modern, clean look that fits perfectly with the brand’s internet culture and meme styling. Despite the edgy meme-inspired aesthetics, the layout remains intuitive and easy to navigate.

Right from landing on the homepage, you’re greeted with clear game categories and shortcuts to popular titles. The filtering options and search functionality make it simple to sort through the thousands of games available. The interface works seamlessly whether on desktop or mobile devices.

Conclusion

Branded slot collaborations bring familiar characters to the reels with games like Narcos, John Hunter and the Tomb of the Scarab Queen, and Gordon Ramsay Hell’s Kitchen.

High variance slots like Legacy of Dead and Rise of Merlin offer the chance for huge wins. And daily race style slots like Release the Kraken and Avalanche provide non-stop action.

You’ll also find an extensive selection of jackpot slots with massive progressives up for grabs.

Duelbits offers 100+ table games spanning blackjack, baccarat, roulette, poker and more. Blackjack fans will appreciate the 30+ variants like Classic Blackjack, Single Deck Blackjack, Blackjack Surrender, Multihand Blackjack and Perfect Pairs.

Roulette options include European, American, French, Double Ball and Speed Roulette. For poker, you can play Casino Hold’em, Caribbean Stud and Triple Card Poker.

Those looking for big wins can try out the range of money wheel style games like Crazy Time, Monopoly Live and Mega Ball.

Live Casino

Immerse yourself in the action with 100+ live dealer games powered by Evolution Gaming and Pragmatic Play. You’ll feel like you’re in a real casino with professional croupiers, high quality streams and interactive features.

Crash

One unique game you’ll only find at Duelbits is Crash, a hugely popular crypto gambling game. Crash gives you the chance to win big from a small bet by cashing out at the right time.

A round starts with the multiplier at 1x. The multiplier then begins to rise rapidly, going higher by the second. You can cash out at any time to get your bet multiplied by whatever the current multiplier is. But if you wait too long, the game can crash at any moment, wiping out your bet. The key is to cash out right before a crash to maximize your payout.

With multipliers sometimes reaching into the thousands before a crash, Crash can lead to massive wins if your timing is right. Duelbits offers autoplay options and allows you to bet up to 50 BTC per round. You can also spectate rounds in real-time and chat with other players, making Crash an exciting social experience.

As a provably fair game, players can verify the fairness of each crash, ensuring results are random as advertised. Crash is a unique crypto betting game you won’t find anywhere else, perfectly showcasing Duelbits’ innovation in the online gambling space.

Dice Duels

Duelbits also offers its own exclusive game called Dice Duels that can’t be played anywhere else. Dice Duels pits you against other players in a battle of dice rolls with crypto on the line.

To start, each player puts up the same entry bet. All bets go into a shared pot. Then every player rolls a 100-sided dice. Whoever lands the highest roll wins the entire pot!

Dice Duels is fun, fast-paced, and highly rewarding if you can roll higher than your opponents. With the ability to watch and chat with other players in real-time, it makes for an exciting and social crypto gambling experience.

As an in-house creation, Duelbits has made sure Dice Duels is provably fair. You can verify the randomness of rolls on each round, showing results are truly luck based.

Dice Duels provides a novel way to go head-to-head against other Duelbits players. Combining everything from skill to strategy to sheer luck, it’s a game that crypto enthusiasts will love. Duelbits Payment Methods

The mix of crypto and gift card deposit options allows players to use whatever method they prefer. Crypto is recommended for faster and cheaper transactions. The availability of crypto sets Duelbits apart from traditional online casinos.

One notable restriction is that Duelbits does not support fiat currency withdrawals directly like dollars or euros. You must withdraw to crypto when cashing out your balance.

Is Duelbits Legit?

When reviewing any online gambling site, considering trust and safety is paramount. Based on several factors, Duelbits establishes itself as a legitimate and secure crypto casino.

While no online casino can be 100% flawless, Duelbits checks the right boxes in terms of transparency, security, and accountability. Both recreational and high-stakes players can feel confident in a safe and fair gambling experience.

Is Duelbits Safe to Use?

When depositing your own money to gamble, safety should be the top priority. Based on several key factors, Duelbits establishes a secure environment for online gambling:

item.content:encoded:
BaseBet Casino is a new player in the online gambling world, launched in 2024. This crypto-friendly platform offers a wide range of gaming options, including slots, table games, live dealer games, and sports betting.

With its user-friendly interface, generous bonuses, and innovative BBT token, BaseBet aims to provide a unique and rewarding experience for both crypto enthusiasts and traditional gamblers.

This review will explore the key features of BaseBet Casino, including its game selection, bonuses, banking options, and overall user experience.

Let’s go!

Visit BaseBet

Quick Verdict: BaseBet is a crypto casino and sportsbook that combines a vast selection of games and blockchain-based rewards through its BBT token and NFT offerings.

Quick Facts

Category Information
Website https://basebet.io/
Established 2024
License Curacao
Game Types Slots, Table Games, Live Casino, Sports Betting
Number of Games 7,000+
Currencies BTC, ETH, USDT, LTC, and more
Deposit Methods Cryptocurrencies, Credit Cards, Bank Transfers
Withdrawal Methods Cryptocurrencies
Customer Support 24/7 Live Chat, Email
Unique Feature BBT Token with staking and rewards

Casino Games

Slots

BaseBet boasts an impressive collection of over 7,000 slot games. These games come from multiple providers, ensuring a wide variety of themes, features, and gameplay styles.

Players can enjoy classic 3-reel slots, modern video slots with multiple paylines, and progressive jackpot slots offering the chance for massive wins.

The large selection ensures that both casual players and slot enthusiasts will find games that suit their tastes.

Live Casino

The live casino section at BaseBet brings the excitement of a real casino floor to players’ screens. Hosted by professional dealers and streamed in high-definition video, these games offer an immersive experience.

Players can enjoy live versions of popular table games such as blackjack, baccarat, and roulette. The live casino  features multiple variants of each game, catering to different bet sizes and player preferences.

Interactive features such as live chat with dealers and other players enhance the social aspect of these games.

Table Games

For those who prefer traditional casino games, BaseBet offers a selection of digital table games. This category includes various versions of blackjack, poker, baccarat, and craps.

These games are computer-generated, allowing players to enjoy them at their own pace. The table games section includes both classic versions and modern variants with unique side bets or gameplay twists.

This category provides a good option for players who want to practice strategies or enjoy quick gaming sessions.

Game Shows

Game show-style games have become increasingly popular in online casinos, and BaseBet includes a selection of these entertaining options.

These games often combine elements of luck, strategy, and interactive gameplay. They may feature colorful wheels, multipliers, and bonus rounds, creating an engaging and often fast-paced gaming experience.

Popular titles in this category might include games based on TV show formats or unique concepts developed specifically for online casinos.

Roulette

Roulette holds a special place in casino gaming, and BaseBet offers multiple versions of this classic game. Players can choose from American, European, and French roulette variants, each with its own specific rules and table layouts.

The roulette section may also include modern variations with additional betting options or unique features. Both live and digital versions of roulette are typically available, allowing players to choose between the excitement of live-streamed games and the convenience of instant-play digital versions.

Sports Betting at BaseBet

The platform covers over 50 sport categories, ensuring a diverse selection that goes beyond popular sports like football, basketball, and tennis to include emerging categories such as esports.

This wide coverage provides betting opportunities for fans of both mainstream and niche sports.

One of the standout features of BaseBet’s sportsbook is the extensive betting markets available for each event. With an average of 300 betting markets per event, bettors have access to a variety of options beyond simple win/lose bets.

These markets include point spreads, over/under totals, player props, and team props, allowing for more strategic and diverse betting strategies.

The platform’s high event coverage is another notable aspect, with more than 150,000 monthly events on the schedule. This volume ensures that there are consistent betting opportunities available around the clock, spanning various leagues, tournaments, and competitions worldwide.

Additionally, BaseBet offers live or in-play betting, allowing users to place bets on events as they unfold, adding an extra layer of excitement and strategic depth to the betting experience.

BaseBet has integrated its sportsbook seamlessly into its main platform, providing a user-friendly interface that’s easy to navigate.

This is particularly crucial for quick bet placements, especially in live betting scenarios. While there’s no dedicated mobile app, the website is optimized for mobile browsers, allowing users to place bets and follow sports events on-the-go from their smartphones or tablets.

Other Products

BBT Token

BaseBet has introduced its native cryptocurrency, the BBT token, which adds a new dimension to the platform’s ecosystem. This token is designed to enhance user engagement and provide additional benefits to players.

The BBT token offers several advantages to holders. Users can stake their BBT tokens to earn high Annual Percentage Yield (APY) rewards, providing an additional avenue for potential profits. Token holders also enjoy accelerated progression through the VIP program, advancing 1.2 to 2 times faster than non-holders.

In terms of gameplay, BBT tokens unlock supercharged jackpots, giving users more chances at significant payouts when wagering with BBT. The platform also hosts exclusive tournaments for BBT holders, featuring substantial prize pools.

BaseBet has implemented a deflationary model for BBT, which includes regular buybacks and token burns. This mechanism is designed to potentially increase the value of BBT over time, benefiting long-term holders.

Early buyers of BBT during the presale phase are eligible for a special 25% cashback guarantee on all wagers made using BBT after the presale ends. This offers an attractive incentive for early adopters of the token.

NFTs

BaseBet has also ventured into the world of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) with its Gatos NFT collection. This collection represents more than just digital art; it offers a unique profit-sharing model that turns NFT holders into stakeholders in the platform’s success.

The most distinctive feature of the Gatos NFT collection is that 30% of BaseBet’s monthly profits are distributed directly to the holders of these NFTs. This innovative approach aligns the interests of the platform with its most engaged users, creating a symbiotic relationship between BaseBet and its community.

While specific details about the artwork, rarity tiers, or minting process of the Gatos NFTs are not provided, the profit-sharing model alone makes them an intriguing proposition for those looking to have a vested interest in BaseBet’s performance.

The integration of both the BBT token and the Gatos NFT collection showcases BaseBet’s commitment to embracing blockchain technology beyond just accepting cryptocurrencies for deposits and withdrawals.

These products create an ecosystem that rewards engaged users, potentially fostering a more loyal and active community around the platform.

By offering these blockchain-based products alongside its traditional casino and sports betting options, BaseBet positions itself at the forefront of the evolving intersection between gambling and cryptocurrency.

This approach not only differentiates BaseBet from many traditional online casinos but also provides users with multiple ways to engage with and potentially profit from the platform beyond standard gameplay.

Welcome Bonuses at BaseBet

BaseBet offers an attractive welcome package designed to give new players a strong start on the platform. The welcome bonus is structured to cater to both casino game enthusiasts and sports bettors, providing a balanced incentive for different types of players.

For casino players, BaseBet provides a tiered bonus system based on wagering activity:

  1. Upon wagering $100, players unlock mystery box #1.
  2. Reaching $500 in wagers opens mystery box #2.
  3. Finally, wagering $1,000 reveals the grand prize box.

These mystery boxes contain random free spins, adding an element of excitement and surprise to the bonus structure. The exact number of free spins in each box is not specified, maintaining the mystery aspect of the reward.

Sports bettors are not left out of the welcome package. New users can claim a matching free bet of up to $500 on their first win. This bonus effectively doubles the payout of a player’s first successful sports wager, up to a maximum of $500.

In total, the welcome package offers up to $1,000 in bonus value, split between the casino and sportsbook sections of the platform. This dual-format bonus allows new users to explore both aspects of BaseBet’s offering with some added value.

  2. Find the Sign-Up Button: Look for a “Sign Up” or “Register” button, typically located in the top right corner of the homepage.

  4. Agree to Terms and Conditions: Read through the terms and conditions, and tick the box to indicate your agreement.
  5. Age Verification: Confirm that you are of legal gambling age (typically 18+ or 21+ depending on your jurisdiction).
  6. Complete Registration: Click the “Create Account” or “Register” button to finalize your account creation.
  7. Email Verification: Check your email inbox for a verification message from BaseBet. Click the link in the email to verify your account.
  8. Login: Once verified, you can log in to your new BaseBet account using your email/username and password.
  9. Make a Deposit: To start playing or betting, you’ll need to make a deposit. Navigate to the cashier section to choose your preferred deposit method.

Remember, BaseBet is a crypto-friendly casino, so you have the option to use cryptocurrencies for your transactions. The platform also accepts traditional payment methods for those who prefer them.

item.content:encoded:
Rakebit Casino has emerged as a popular choice for online gamblers, especially those who prefer using cryptocurrencies.

Visit Rakebit

  3. Multiple Tiers: The program features several tiers, each offering increasingly valuable benefits. Players progress through these tiers as they accumulate more points.

  5. Regular Rewards: Even at lower tiers, players can exchange their loyalty points for bonuses, free spins, or other rewards in the Rakebit store.
  6. Customized Offers: Higher-tier members often receive personalized bonuses tailored to their playing preferences.

Rakebit’s combination of regular promotions and a comprehensive loyalty program ensures that players are consistently rewarded for their activity on the platform. Rakebit’s commitment to cryptocurrency transactions provides several advantages, including faster processing times, lower fees, and enhanced privacy compared to traditional payment methods.

The platform ensures that deposits are credited instantly to players’ accounts, allowing for immediate play. For withdrawals, Rakebit aims to process requests promptly, subject to any necessary security checks.

Is it Legit?
